item.description:
Halloween costume Climb at Rumney !!

Saturday night at the campground wear a costume! if you want to wear one while climbing that's fine also.

this will be Halloween themed. I say we go back to our "more youthful" days and participate in candy apples, sugar doughnuts on a stick (where you can't use your hands to eat them) and other fun Halloween oriented things.

POST some ideas....

Equipment: climbing and camping gear. tent sleeping bag (nights will be cold) Clothing suitable for variable weather.

Camping: we'll be staying at Rattlesnake Mtn Campground. $12.00 per person per night.

Dinner: HMMMMM what will the caldron boil and simmer, bring something, share something, and eat hearty.

 

if you are driving up on friday we'll meet at the campground.

those that are coming up saturday morning, we'll meet at the PAY STATION picnic table in the main parking lot.

 

directions: 93north to exit 26 (rt 25west) follow rt25 to the rotary stay on rt25 and pass the polar caves on the left. stay on rt25 till you see the sign for rumney village. take that right onto Main street(double blinking yellow lights) follow main st. over the bridge and take that left at Buffalo rd.(white church) follow buffalo rd to the parking lot to rumney climbing on the right.     for gps use 415 buffalo rd. rumney nh.
item.how_to_find_us: meet at the pay station picnic table
item.name: Rumney Halloween Costume Climbing and Camping!
